**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 182 4.0 **Trigger** Your Strike hits a [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creature and deals damage. --- You apply one of the following debilitations, which lasts until the end of your next turn.
  • **Debilitation** The target takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds.
  • **Debilitation** The target becomes [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13).
name: Debilitating Strike
